text: Bigu: «Alloh taolo»-ro ʙixoned jo «Rahmon»-ro ʙixoned; har kadomro, ki ʙixoned, nakutarini nomho ʙaroi Ust». Va [ej Pajomʙar] namozatro [oncunon] ʙa sadoi ʙaland naxon [ki musrikon ʙisnavand] va onro [on qadr niz] ohista naxon [ki hatto ashoʙat nasnavand]; va mijoni in [du holat] rohe [mijona] ʙicuj
